amendatorysection.para: District No. 28 shall contain that part of Lancaster County beginning at the intersection of South 12th Street and O Street, south on South 12th Street to South Street, east on South Street to South 56th Street, north on South 56th Street to A Street, east on A Street to South 70th Street, north on South 70th Street to O Street, and west on O Street to the point of beginning.
